org.antfarmer.ejce.password.encoder

Class AbstractScryptPasswordEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.antfarmer.ejce.password.AbstractConfigurablePasswordEncoder
      • org.antfarmer.ejce.password.encoder.AbstractScryptPasswordEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurablePasswordEncoder, PasswordEncoderAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BcScryptEncoder, SpringScryptEncoder

    public abstract class AbstractScryptPasswordEncoder
extends AbstractConfigurablePasswordEncoder
    Abstract class for SCrypt password encoder implementations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_CPU_COST
      The default CPU cost if no value is specified.
      static int DEFAULT_KEY_LENGTH
      The default key length in bytes if no value is specified.
      static int DEFAULT_MEM_COST
      The default Memory cost if no value is specified.
      static int DEFAULT_PARALLELIZATION
      The default Parallelization value if no value is specified.
      static int DEFAULT_SALT_LENGTH
      The default salt length in bytes if no value is specified.
      static String KEY_CPU_COST
      Property key for the cpu cost of the algorithm (as defined in scrypt this is N).
      static String KEY_KEY_LENGTH
      Property key for the key length in bytes for the algorithm (as defined in scrypt this is dkLen).
      static String KEY_MEM_COST
      Property key for the memory cost of the algorithm (as defined in scrypt this is r).
      static String KEY_PARALLELIZATION
      Property key for the parallelization of the algorithm (as defined in scrypt this is p) Default is currently 1.
      static String KEY_SALT_LENGTH
      Property key for the salt length in bytes (as defined in scrypt this is the length of S).

    • Field Detail

      • KEY_CPU_COST

        public static final String KEY_CPU_COST
        Property key for the cpu cost of the algorithm (as defined in scrypt this is N). Must be power of 2 greater than 1. Default is currently 16,348 or 2^14
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_MEM_COST

        public static final String KEY_MEM_COST
        Property key for the memory cost of the algorithm (as defined in scrypt this is r). Default is currently 8.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_PARALLELIZATION

        public static final String KEY_PARALLELIZATION
        Property key for the parallelization of the algorithm (as defined in scrypt this is p) Default is currently 1. Note that the implementation does not currently take advantage of parallelization.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_KEY_LENGTH

        public static final String KEY_KEY_LENGTH
        Property key for the key length in bytes for the algorithm (as defined in scrypt this is dkLen). The default is currently 32.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_SALT_LENGTH

        public static final String KEY_SALT_LENGTH
        Property key for the salt length in bytes (as defined in scrypt this is the length of S). The default is currently 64.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_CPU_COST

        public static final int DEFAULT_CPU_COST
        The default CPU cost if no value is specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int DEFAULT_MEM_COST
        The default Memory cost if no value is specified.
        See Also:

        public static final int DEFAULT_PARALLELIZATION
        The default Parallelization value if no value is specified.
        See Also:

        public static final int DEFAULT_KEY_LENGTH
        The default key length in bytes if no value is specified.
